thread.title: So Far So Good
thread.title_full: So Far So Good - Review of Paris France Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Muffindog
title: So Far So Good
text:
We were looking for a hotel in the next few weeks to visit our family who stay in the locality and found this place, booking very easy and cost sensible for the centre of Paris but as it's our first visit to Paris in 25 years, we were a bit cautious about navigating the RER & MÃ©tro into the city from CDG so called the hotel about a car transfer - call quickly picked up by a friendly receptionist who confirmed they provide the service and at a very reasonable cost
Followed the advice about asking for a quiet room and were told we were already booked into one...even better so far.
Now looking forward to our visit, hopefully no strikes on Air France, no riots and good weather...
Room Tip: Will post more once we have stayed. See more room tips
